about_the_game:
HOW WILL YOU SPELL VICTORY?


Embark on an epic linguistic adventure in Letters & Legends, where words and wits are your greatest weapons! Fight your way against 120 unique monsters eager to test your semantic supremacy!

Spell your way to victory as you navigate through more than 100 challenging levels, from nail-biting timed challenges to mind-bending anagrams. Choose your difficulty level and prove your lexical dominance in a game that combines brainpower with brawn.

Select your champion from a trio of powerful characters, each wielding their own distinctive fighting style. Level up your heroes to unlock special skills to turn the tide of battle in your favour. But beware: the monsters are cunning wordsmiths too and can retaliate with their own words of power, keeping you on your toes in this dictionary duel!

Enhance your arsenal with 40 magical items, granting you the upper hand in the linguistic battleground.

Sharpen your tongue and show your enemies who the true wordsmith is!

3 UNIQUE CHARACTERS!


Choose from 3 unique characters: The Mage, The Brute, or the Rogue! Each character brings their own special skills to the fight!

  • The Mage can heal themselves if they use a word that has 5 or more letters!
  • The Brute does extra damage if they use all the tiles in a row or column, and can set tiles on fire for extra damage!
  • The Rogue can use shorter words for a chance to take extra turns, and can turn tiles into bombs to damage enemies!

Play unique challenge levels to level up each character, taking advantage of their skills to defeat exclusive enemies!

MORE THAN 100 CHALLENGING LEVELS & 120 MONSTERS TO DEFEAT!


Fight everything from giant rats to hell demons as you bring your most damaging lexicon to 5 chapters and more than 100 levels!

Beware as your enemies change the rules of the grid, by blocking tiles or turning them into acid or electricity, or even by increasing the minimum number of letters you need to form a word! Can you find Killer Words to defeat them? How erudite can you make your retaliations?

Face off against the scholarly Sir Shuffle and his arduous anagrams - how vast is your vocabulary?

Unlock Endless levels, where you can face off against every enemy you have defeated in a chapter, or even against every enemy you have defeated in the whole game, one after the other! Can you defeat the devilish Redux levels, or master the Mega Challenges, where you'll need every wit and word at your disposal?

MORE THAN 40 SPECIAL ITEMS!


Unlock Special Items to aid you in your fight, from the stopwatch to give you extra time to the almighty Mallet of Literacy that will make consonants do extra damage! Remember, though: you can only bring 1 Special Item with you into battle, so choose wisely!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 or Radeon® HD4800 series, 512 MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

reviews:
“Letters & Legends is a highly-polished title that hones in on a wonderfully simple premise and bastes it with character and colour.”
9/10 – Games Freezer

“An excellent casual word game that delivers exactly what I expected. A fun hidden gem.”
7.5/10 – Higher Plain Games

“A captivating blend of challenging word-based combat, strategic decision-making, and character development in a fantasy world.”
Games Ardor
